answerText: cAMP [or cyclic adenosine monophosphate][10] cAMP is inhibited by this enzyme, which breaks it down into the nucleotide AMP.

subject: Science
question: Question: Protein kinase A is activated when bound to this molecule.  [10] Name this molecule derived from ATP, best known as an intracellular second messenger.
